publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3544 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees as a revision to the Business Programme agreed on 30 October 2002— Wednesday 6 November 2002after first Parliamentary Bureau Motions, delete—"followed by Ministerial Statement"Thursday 7 November 2002delete— "9:30 am Executive Debate on the Scottish Executive Response to Foot and Mouth Disease Inquiries"and insert—"9:30 am Ministerial Statement on Housingfollowed by Executive Debate on Forestry in Scotland"Supported by: Euan Robson*
